name: Paper Plane Game
description:
In this game, you're a cute little paper plane who flies around, collects red dots, and avoids bombs! There's high scores, a rainbow trail, and a few short tracks to fly around to.

Since this is a Pico-8 game, use the arrow keys and z/x buttons, or use a gamepad if you have one plugged in.

This was made at Squiggly River's October 2022 Camp Jam. If you're in Brisbane, Australia, come check us out!
